title: In case the building is proposed on any area filled up with carcasses, excreta, filth and offensive
clause_text: In case the building is proposed on any area filled up with carcasses, excreta, filth and offensive matter, then certificate from the Authority to the effect that it is safe from the health and sanitary point of view, to be built upon, is required;
section: Site not Eligible for Construction of Building

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
